author: sagara
msg: RAMPART-375 - Improved Ant script to download xercesImpl-2.9.1.jar and set it as jvmarg to fulfill endorsed requirements.

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-5370: Added direct-vm component to act as synchronous direct calls between multiple camel contexts in the same JVM (eg like direct + vm together). Can be used to support transactions spanning multiple camel contextes / bundles.
